resources.string: Kampala Hangouts
Restaurants
Attractions
Parks
Events
Hotels
Back button
Discover the best restaurants in your city.
Explore the top attractions and landmarks in your city.
Find beautiful parks and green spaces to relax and unwind.
Stay updated with the latest events happening in your city.
Browse a selection of hotels for your stay in the city.
Café Javas
Café Javas offers a diverse menu of delicious meals, from breakfast to dinner, in a cozy and vibrant setting.
The Lawns Restaurant
The Lawns Restaurant provides a unique dining experience with its beautiful garden ambiance and a menu featuring a fusion of international flavors.
Yujo Izakaya
Yujo Izakaya serves authentic Japanese cuisine, including sushi, sashimi, and a variety of delicious small plates, all prepared with fresh ingredients.
Khana Khazana
Khana Khazana specializes in Indian cuisine, offering a wide range of flavorful dishes that showcase the rich and diverse flavors of India.
Mediterraneo Restaurant
Mediterraneo Restaurant brings the tastes of the Mediterranean to Kampala, offering a selection of dishes inspired by the coastal regions of Europe.
2K Restaurant
2K Restaurant provides a welcoming atmosphere and a menu that features a fusion of African and international flavors, with a focus on grilled specialties.
Prunes Cafe & Bistro
Prunes Cafe & Bistro offers a cozy and relaxed environment, perfect for enjoying a cup of coffee, pastries, or a variety of continental dishes.
Java House
Java House is a popular café chain known for its freshly brewed coffee, wide range of meals, and a vibrant atmosphere that appeals to all.
Biryani House
Biryani House specializes in flavorful biryanis, curries, and traditional Indian dishes, offering a taste of authentic Indian cuisine.
The Bistro Restaurant
The Bistro Restaurant provides a sophisticated dining experience, offering a diverse menu of gourmet dishes crafted with meticulous attention to detail.
Uganda Museum
Uganda Museum showcases the rich cultural heritage of Uganda through various exhibitions, artifacts, and historical displays.
Kasubi Tombs
Kasubi Tombs is a UNESCO World Heritage Site and the burial grounds of the Buganda kings, offering insight into the kingdom\'s history and traditions.
Ndere Cultural Centre
Ndere Cultural Centre is a vibrant hub for Ugandan culture, showcasing traditional music, dance performances, and cultural workshops.
Uganda National Mosque (Gaddafi Mosque)
Uganda National Mosque, also known as Gaddafi Mosque, is one of the largest mosques in Africa, offering stunning views of Kampala from its minaret.
Kabaka\'s Palace (Lubiri)
Kabaka\'s Palace, also known as Lubiri, is the palace of the king of Buganda and serves as an important cultural and historical landmark.
Namugongo Martyrs Shrine
Namugongo Martyrs Shrine commemorates the Ugandan Martyrs, offering a serene environment for reflection and religious pilgrimage.
Bahai Temple
Bahai Temple is a beautiful architectural marvel and a place of worship for the Bahai faith, known for its stunning gardens and peaceful ambiance.
Munyonyo Martyrs\' Shrine
Munyonyo Martyrs\' Shrine honors the 22 Catholic martyrs of Uganda, providing a serene and sacred space for prayer and reflection.
Uganda National Botanical Gardens
Uganda National Botanical Gardens is a lush oasis featuring a diverse collection of flora, walking trails, and a peaceful environment for nature lovers.
Lake Victoria
Lake Victoria is the largest lake in Africa and offers a range of activities, including boat rides, fishing, and stunning sunsets over the water.
Queen Elizabeth National Park
Queen Elizabeth National Park is a diverse wildlife reserve, home to a wide range of animals, including elephants, lions, hippos, and various bird species.
Bwindi Impenetrable National Park
Bwindi Impenetrable National Park is renowned for its population of mountain gorillas, offering unique trekking experiences and the opportunity to observe these incredible creatures.
Murchison Falls National Park
Murchison Falls National Park is known for its powerful waterfall, diverse wildlife, including elephants, giraffes, and Nile crocodiles, and exciting boat safaris along the Nile River.
Kidepo Valley National Park
Kidepo Valley National Park is a remote and rugged wilderness, offering breathtaking landscapes, abundant wildlife, and a truly off-the-beaten-path safari experience.
Lake Mburo National Park
Lake Mburo National Park is a compact park known for its scenic landscapes, zebras, impalas, and the opportunity to explore the park on foot or by horseback.
Rwenzori Mountains National Park
Rwenzori Mountains National Park is a UNESCO World Heritage Site, offering stunning mountain scenery, alpine vegetation, and challenging trekking expeditions.
Kibale National Park
Kibale National Park is famous for its population of chimpanzees, offering an opportunity to trek through the forest and observe these fascinating primates up close.
Semuliki National Park
Semuliki National Park is known for its unique and diverse ecosystem, including hot springs, tropical rainforests, and rare bird species.
Mount Elgon National Park
Mount Elgon National Park is home to Mount Elgon, an extinct volcano with vast calderas, waterfalls, caves, and opportunities for hiking and mountain climbing.
Mgahinga Gorilla National Park
Mgahinga Gorilla National Park offers a unique chance to track and observe the endangered mountain gorillas in their natural habitat, along with stunning volcanic landscapes.
Kampala City Festival
Kampala City Festival is an annual event celebrating the vibrancy and diversity of Kampala through street parades, music performances, food, and cultural showcases.
Bayimba International Festival of the Arts
Bayimba International Festival of the Arts is a multi-day event featuring various art forms, including music, dance, theater, visual arts, and poetry.
Nyege Nyege Festival
Nyege Nyege Festival is a renowned music and arts festival that celebrates the diversity of African music, bringing together artists from different genres and regions.
Rolex Festival
Rolex Festival celebrates the famous Ugandan street food, the "Rolex," which is a delicious combination of eggs, vegetables, and chapati, along with music, performances, and competitions.
Kampala Restaurant Week
Kampala Restaurant Week is a culinary event where participating restaurants offer special menus and discounted prices, allowing people to explore the city\'s vibrant food scene.
Lantern Carnival
Lantern Carnival is a festive event where participants carry beautifully crafted lanterns and parade through the streets, accompanied by music, dance, and entertainment.
Kampala Fashion Week
Kampala Fashion Week showcases the creativity and talent of Ugandan fashion designers, featuring runway shows, exhibitions, and discussions on the fashion industry.
Kampala International Theatre Festival
Kampala International Theatre Festival is a platform for theater artists from Uganda and around the world to showcase their productions, engage in workshops, and promote cultural exchange.
Pearl of Africa Tourism Expo
Pearl of Africa Tourism Expo is an annual event that promotes Uganda\'s tourism industry, featuring exhibitions, presentations, and networking opportunities for industry professionals.
Ekyooto International Cultural Festival
Ekyooto International Cultural Festival celebrates the diverse cultural heritage of Uganda through traditional music, dance performances, storytelling, and cultural displays.
Serena Hotel Kampala
Serena Hotel Kampala is a luxurious 5-star hotel offering elegant accommodations, excellent dining options, and a range of amenities for a comfortable stay.
Sheraton Kampala Hotel
Sheraton Kampala Hotel is a well-known 5-star hotel that combines modern comforts, exceptional service, and a central location in the heart of Kampala.
Protea Hotel by Marriott Kampala
Protea Hotel by Marriott Kampala offers stylish rooms, a rooftop pool, and a convenient location near popular attractions, making it an ideal choice for both business and leisure travelers.
Speke Resort & Conference Centre
Speke Resort & Conference Centre is a sprawling property offering luxurious accommodations, multiple dining options, a golf course, and extensive conference facilities.
Kampala Serena Hotel
Kampala Serena Hotel is a prestigious 5-star hotel known for its elegant architecture, luxurious rooms, and world-class amenities, providing a truly unforgettable experience.
Golden Tulip Canaan Kampala
Golden Tulip Canaan Kampala offers comfortable rooms, a rooftop terrace, and a convenient location, making it a popular choice for business and leisure travelers.
Hotel Africana
Hotel Africana provides spacious rooms, a swimming pool, and easy access to the city center, making it a suitable option for both business and leisure stays.
Mestil Hotel & Residences
Mestil Hotel & Residences offers modern accommodations, a rooftop pool, and a range of facilities for guests to relax and enjoy their stay in Kampala.
Fairway Hotel & Spa
Fairway Hotel & Spa features comfortable rooms, a spa and wellness center, and a central location near shopping centers and entertainment venues.
Humura Resorts
Humura Resorts is a boutique hotel offering personalized service, stylish rooms, and a tranquil atmosphere, ensuring a memorable stay in Kampala.
